<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Find purchase order by ID</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/store/order/{orderId}"}></MethodEndpoint>

<SecuritySchemes
  infoPath={"docs/api/operate/swagger-petstore-yaml"}
></SecuritySchemes>

For valid response try integer IDs with value <= 5 or > 10. Other values will generated exceptions

## Request
